name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania Institutional Health Services, Inc. v. Commonwealth
docket_number: Appeal No. 115 Middle District Appeal Docket 1994

judges: MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: PENNSYLVANIA INSTITUTIONAL HEALTH SERVICES, INC.; Carl A. Hoffman; John Lesniewski; Edward Russek; Paul F. Phillips; Robert Davis; and Dana Powell, Appellants, v. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
669 A.2d 876
PENNSYLVANIA INSTITUTIONAL HEALTH SERVICES, INC.; Carl A. Hoffman; John Lesniewski; Edward Russek; Paul F. Phillips; Robert Davis; and Dana Powell, Appellants, v.
